fields.name: Boo
fields.home_details: Boo is looking for a nice quiet home where people will be around a lot of the time. She would love a garden to burn off some energy off in.
fields.about: Boo loves nothing more than sleeping, eating sausages and a going for brief walks. She is a small greyhound with a big personality. She is unphased by other dogs, but can be very watchful of other smaller animals.

fields.name: Bailey
fields.home_details: Bailey is looking for an adult only home with previous dog experience and someone who is willing to train; he is shy with new people but soon comes round. Bailey has successfully lived with dogs in the past so could have a doggy pal in his new home pending meets. Bailey travels well and knows all hi
fields.about: Bailey is a sweet 5 year old Springer Spaniel. He enjoys human company when he becomes comfortable. He is a super friendly boy and enjoys his walks and travelling in the car.

fields.name: Barney
fields.home_details: Barney is a beautiful little guy who loves his walks and has big energy levels for such a small boy. Barney is looking for an understanding, adult only home with no visiting children, a quiet home with 2 adults would be ideal as Barney struggles with busy households. Barney can be selective with dog
fields.about: Barney will benefit from quiet walking areas to decompress. It is important that Barney's potential adopters are able to travel to the Ballymena Rehoming Centre quite regularly, he has shown some challenging behaviours within his previous home, this will all be discussed with the training team if successful.

fields.name: Beau
fields.home_details: Beau is a stunning 2 year old GSD who still acts like a big puppy, she loves her toys and enjoys learning new tricks for treats. Beau is looking for an adult only, experienced home; she can be wary of strangers and reactive to dogs so will need quiet walking areas.
fields.about: Beau will require several meets at the centre before going to her forever home. Beau would also need to be the only pet in the home.

fields.name: Bella
fields.home_details: Bella may take a little longer to come around to her new adopters, so a couple of meets would be important. Drake and Bella are not showing any signs of being house trained so it is important that their new adopter will understand and work with this.
fields.about: Bella is a super 7 year old Pug. She came into the centre with her male companion Drake. She is a little bit more nervous than her companion. She enjoys the comforts of her warm bed and dinner time.

fields.name: Bernadette
fields.home_details: Bernadette is looking for a home with someone around for the majority of the day to provide her with all of her basic training and socialisation. Her adopters will need to be willing to attend our wonderful Dog School Training classes and to put in lots of extra work at home.
fields.about: Bernadette is a sweet puppy who is also full of life and mischief. She loves playing with toys and getting cuddles.Bernadette will be ready for adoption when she is 8 weeks old. She is one of a larger litter.

fields.name: Brody
fields.home_details: Brody is looking for a calm and quiet adult only home with no children and no visiting children, he does need someone around with him for most of the day and prefers his walks to be away from traffic. When Brody is feeling playful he likes a soft toy, otherwise he is quite happy.
fields.about: Brody can be shy when he first meets new people but he does come round in his own time and can be a very affectionate little dog who enjoys cuddles once he gets to know and trust someone. He is not keen being left on his own and prefers to be in the bed with you at night time. A foster family are providing Brody with lots of love and attention until he is adopted, if you would like to discuss Brody's medical needs, please get in touch. Brody is 8 years old.

fields.name: Bruiser
fields.home_details: Bruiser is a cute little terrier cross who is 7 years old. He is a friendly little guy who enjoys his walkies and playing fetch, Bruiser would be best suited to an adult only home with no other pets.  Bruiser is a bit of an escape artist, so a secure garden is a must.
fields.about: He will need plenty of quiet walking areas away from other dogs. Bruiser is not a fan of dogs in his face and will be required to be walked on a lead.

fields.name: Casper
fields.home_details: Casper is worried by busy environments and needs a quiet adult only home with no visiting children and few visiting adults. He does find walks stressful and so needs a home with a decent sized secure garden.
fields.about: Casper is a great doggy companion, he is a shy but very sweet natured and clever boy looking for a quiet home. He is housetrained and loves a snuggle once he gets to know you, his favourite toy to play with is a ball! Casper does not like it when people leave the house and is currently on a training plan. Casper prefers to know you are closeby and likes to sleep in the bedroom with you at night. He needs to be the only dog in the home and needs a home where he is rarely going to be left alone.

fields.name: Cleo
fields.home_details: Cleo is seeking an active home with a large secure garden, with no neighbouring dogs. She can get really worked up when she sees other dogs and will need to be taken to quiet areas for walking.
fields.about: Cleo is a real livewire who is 3 years old, she is a very busy girl with bundles of energy. Cleo can be a little shy at first but soon comes round and when she does you have a best friend for life! she loves toys, especially a tennis ball. Due to Cleo's activity levels she would be best suited to a home with older teenage kids ages 16 and up. New owners ideally will have some previous training knowledge and be keen to work with Cleo.

fields.name: Dougie
fields.home_details: Dougie will need understanding owners that can manage his limited eyesight well and have no other pets at home. He needs someone that will manage his medical needs well.
fields.about: Dougie is approx 2-3 years old. An adorable, sensitve fella who takes his time getting to know people. Dougie's favourite snack is sausage and he enjoys a snuggle from the carers he knows. He is getting more and more confident every day.

fields.name: Drake
fields.home_details: It is ideal that someone is around most of the day to allow Drake to settle into his new home. Drake has some minor health requirements that can be discussed fully during the rehoming process.
fields.about: Drake is a super 6 year old Pug. He came into the centre with his female companion Bella. He really enjoys her company and is fond of meeting new people. He really enjoys having people around during the day and loves the comfort of his bed.

fields.name: Grieves
fields.home_details: Grieves is looking for a relaxed household with older teenage children, he needs quiet walking areas and someone who can help with his dog reactivity.
fields.about: Grieves is a lovely 6 year old Border Collie who was found straying, he unfortunately had damaged his leg and despite efforts to save his leg the kindest option was to have it removed, this however doesn't stop Grieves from being a super happy guy and he can move really well with 3 legs! according to Grieves a tennis ball is life and if you play with him you will have a best friend for life!

fields.name: Hollie
fields.home_details: Hollie is looking for a quiet, adult only home; preferably 1-2 people in the new home with previous dog experience. Hollie would benefit from someone who is willing to take on some training and management around handling and visitors.
fields.about: Hollie is a super sweet 10 year old crossbreed who enjoys the quiet life, her favourite thing is to snooze in her little den that her carers made for her. She can be shy on first meeting but soon comes round, especially if you have treats! She enjoys a little dander and sometimes she likes to play fetch with a tennis ball.

fields.name: Jack
fields.home_details: Jack is seeking for an owner with time to refresh his basic training as he was recently kept outside; he could share his home with children 12 and up. Jack would benefit from being the only dog in his new home but could have doggy pals.
fields.about: Jack is a lovable 5 year old Lab X who loves a fuss, he's enjoyed meeting new people and dogs at the centre; his favourite toy is a tennis ball which he happily carries about. Jack is full of enthusiasm and can sometimes be a little strong on lead.

fields.name: Jess
fields.home_details: Jess is looking for a home ideally with collie experience, she could live with kids ages 12 and up. Jess hasn't had much experience in a home environment, she can be quite sensitive to certain noises and will need understanding owners who will help her overcome this.
fields.about: Say hello to beautiful Jess, this 3 year old collie is a very friendly lady who loves getting a fuss and a pet. Jess loves her toys and enjoys feeding enrichment which keeps her entertained in her kennel. She is also very sensitive to traffic noises and will need a home in a quiet location, with quiet walking areas; she could share her home with another doggy pal, pending meets.

fields.name: Maisy
fields.home_details: Maisy is looking for a quiet home environment with access to a secure garden of her own, due to her age and mobility she finds it easier walking on carpets or non-slip floors inside. Maisy will need to be the only pet in the home and would rather an adult only home.
fields.about: Maisy is a very sweet and gentle little lady who is shy and quiet but once she does build up some trust with you she enjoys a bit of a scratch but is not keen on lots of handling. She is happy relaxing for the majority of the day but does like a dander in quiet familiar areas where there aren't too many people or dogs. In her foster home Maisy has enjoyed playing fetch with treats and is starting to enjoy enrichment toys with food.

fields.name: Ollie
fields.home_details: Ollie takes his time getting to know new people so potential adopters will need multiple visits before going to his forever home, as he can be cautious of new people he is looking for an adult only home with few visitors and no children.
fields.about: Ollie is a big lovable lump who can build an incredible bond with people once he knows he can trust you; he has never really grown up but that part of his charm as he always puts a smile on his carers faces. Ollie loves to learn new tricks and has loads already under his belt, like paw and go to bed! His favourite toy is a stuffed animal and he has quite an impressive collection in his kennel.

fields.name: Teddy
fields.home_details: Teddy is a lively, bouncy big Labrador mix who is looking for a quiet, experienced home. He loves his food and his toys and is a really clever boy who loves to learn new tricks! He also enjoys getting out in the car.
fields.about: Teddy has some behavioural issues which need to be carefully managed, he can be worried by handling and has been known to guard things of high value, due to this Teddy is looking for an ADULT only experienced home.

fields.name: Vicky
fields.home_details: Vicky will need a couple of meets at the centre with her new adopters, she may benefit from living with another suitable dog in the home and can live with kids aged 16 plus.
fields.about: Vicky enjoys her daily exercise and the company of humans. She likes being out and about with other dogs. Vicky is looking for patient owners who understand her needs, preferable that the adopters have breed experience and that can continue with her confidence building and training.Vicky is a lovely 2 year old Collie.

fields.name: Zed
fields.home_details: Zed can be unsure of new people but brilliant once he's got to know people. He is looking for a quiet adult only home who have previous training experience.
fields.about: Zed is a lively big boy who loves his walks, toys and tasty treats( especially cheese!) He is a very clever boy who enjoys learning new tricks. He has been introduced to clicker training whilst at the centre.Zed will need quiet walking areas away from traffic. He is a strong boy on lead so will need someone physically strong enough to manage him. He would love to do canicross,agility or scent work.

fields.name: Bally
fields.home_details: Bally will need to be the only dog in the home and is unable to live with other pets. He can live with children aged 10 and over and he will need his own private and secure garden. He would like new owners who could be around a lot to provide the love and affection he needs. Bally prefers to not be
fields.about: Bally will need to be kept on a lead and muzzle in public.

fields.name: Bear
fields.home_details: Bear would enjoy a quiet home with a private garden for off lead activity and minimal visitors. Bear would prefer to be the only dog in the home but continue to be socialised on walks when appropriate. He can live with children 16 and over who can be mindful of his hips.
fields.about: Potential adopters will need a chat with our behaviour team and vet team to disucss Bear's medical.

fields.name: Bella
fields.home_details: Bella needs a home in a more rural environment. She is looking for an adult only home with minimal visitors who she will need to meet out and about before coming in. She will need an active family who are willing to continue training in the home. She has had very limited dog socialisation so will ne
fields.about: Bella will need to be kept on lead and muzzled in public. She will require multiple visits to the centre as well as some visits to the home to help her settle in. Adopters will need to live no more than 1 hour from the centre.

fields.name: Bentley
fields.home_details: Bentley is looking for a family who has plenty of love, time and patience. When he gets to know you, he will give you tons of kisses and cuddles! He needs a family who are able to dedicate time and effort into continuing the training that we have started here. New owners will need to be used to, as
fields.about: Potential owners will need to be willing to come to the centre to meet Bentley until he feels fully comfortable with all members of the household. New owners will need to be willing to work with our TBA team, to continue Bentley's training.

fields.name: Caffrey
fields.home_details: Caffrey would need a home where he is able to stay downstairs, or have a ground floor flat, as he can't climb stairs due to his hips. He will need his own private and secure garden, and could live with children aged 16 and over. He will need to be the only dog in the home. Caffrey isn't always sure
fields.about: Potential adopters will need a chat with our Vet about Caffrey's medical.

fields.name: Cosmo
fields.home_details: Cosmo is looking for a home with no leaving hours to start with and with people willing to work on his separation issues. He will need a home with no children under 16 and no other dogs. He would not be suitable for open plan living due to needing his own space around resources. He will need his own
fields.about: New owners will need to be willing to work with the behaviour team on training programmes to help him settle into the home.

fields.name: Frankie
fields.home_details: Frankie may be gorgeous, but he does need a family who have experience and are very confident with managing and working with large boisterous dogs. He is a really fun, active boy, who will bring lots of smiles to your day, he is just needing a family who can continue to encourage him to be a well-ro
fields.about: Potential new owners will need to live within 45 minutes drive of the centre and be able and willing to have multiple meets with Frankie both here and at your own home, before an adoption takes place.

fields.name: Freddie
fields.home_details: Freddie is after patient owners, who are willing to help him build his confidence within the home and provide him with safe spaces to settle. He would be happiest in a quiet, adult only household, without any neighbouring dogs. He will need a private and secure garden and would need to be the only d
fields.about: Potential owners will need to speak with our Vet team to discuss his ongoing medical.

fields.name: Hobo
fields.home_details: Hobo is looking for an adult only home with no other free ranging animals and with minimal visitors. He would need a quiet home with direct access to his own garden. He would be looking for owners who have experience of dogs with resource guarding or issues around handling and are happy to continue
fields.about: If a questionnaire is deemed suitable then potential owners will be sent additional information about Hobo via email before going any further with the application. Potential owners will need to live within an hour's drive of the centre and be able and willing to have multiple meets with Hobo both here and at the home, before an adoption takes place.

fields.name: Jake
fields.home_details: Jake needs new owners who are calm and patient and have time to invest in building his confidence and training, which he really enjoys! Jake will need his own private garden and must be the only pet in the home. He will need an adult only home with minimal leaving hours. He has been positively train
fields.about: Jake's potential new owners will need a call with our Vet to discuss Jake's medical.

fields.name: Jester
fields.home_details: Jester is looking for an adult only home with no other pets in a quiet area away from busy main roads. He will need minimal visitors and low leaving hours. He would need direct access to his own secure private garden. Due to the need to have his own space he would not be suitable for open plan livin
fields.about: Jester will need to be kept on a muzzle and lead in public and at the vets. He will need multiple visits at the centre before coming home.

fields.name: Joseph
fields.home_details: Joseph is looking for a home with his own private and secure garden as he isn't comfortable around other dogs so new owners must understand this. Any leaving hours will need to be built up gradually. It would be beneficial for Joseph to live in a quieter location and a low dog populated area. He cou
fields.about: He will need to wear a lead and muzzle in public, which he has been positively trained to do, and is happy to do so! Potential owners will need a call with our Vet to discuss Joseph's medical.

fields.name: Kane
fields.home_details: Kane is looking for owners ready to give endless cuddles and love. He struggled being left in his previous home and will need people around all the time at first to slowly build this up. Kane can't live with cats and needs to be the only dog in the home. He needs access to a private secure garden, c
fields.about: Potential adopters will need a chat with our behaviour team.

fields.name: Loki Rottie
fields.home_details: Loki would love a home that was away from busy roads. He would like to live in a quiet area and have a secure, private garden for off lead fun and training. He would need to be the only dog in the home, but he is able to have lots of dog walking friends when he is out and about! He is able to live w
fields.about: Any children that Loki would be living with or visiting will need to be aged 16 upwards.

fields.name: Lola S
fields.home_details: She would love a quiet adult only home without too many visitors initally, no more than a 3 person household, where she will find it easier to settle in. Lola is looking to be the only dog in the home. Lola is a young, active girl, so is hoping to go on lovely long walks in quiet areas where she doe
fields.about: Lola will need to be kept on a lead and muzzle in public, but she is more than happy to do so.

fields.name: Macey
fields.home_details: Macey is looking for a quiet rural home with no resident or visiting children. She will need to be the only pet and would love her own private garden to run around in as she will need to be on lead in public. A collie experienced home would be perfect, but she would definitely love to have owners wh
fields.about: Macey will benefit from meeting her new owners here at the centre, rather than the 'handover at home' process. New owners will need to be willing to travel to the centre to complete the rehoming process.

fields.name: Max
fields.home_details: Max is young energetic boy who finds some situations really exciting. His ideal home should be actively involved in training to help Max use his potential. He finds being alone stressful so owners with minimal leaving hours are his match made in heaven. Max can only be the only dog in the home, no c
fields.about: Max is young and energetic boy who loves company of people! He is a massive foodie who will show you all his tricks and learn much more when some tasty treats are involved. Max heart can be easy to win all you need are hands free to cuddle, feed and throw a ball from time to time for him and hell be your best friend.

fields.name: Mikey
fields.home_details: Mikey is looking for an adult only home with no other free ranging animals and with minimal visitors. He would need a quiet home with direct access to his own garden. He would be looking for owners who have experience of dogs with resource guarding or issues around handling and are happy to continue
fields.about: If a questionnaire is deemed suitable then potential owners will be sent additional information about Mikey via email before going any further with the application. Potential owners will need to live within an hour's drive of the centre and be able and willing to have multiple meets with Mikey both here and at the home, before an adoption takes place.

fields.name: Mistletoe
fields.home_details: Mistletoe is looking for a family who can show her the ropes and introduce her to the world. They will need to be patient as she has been in kennels for nearly a year. Mistletoe ideally would live with another dog. As Mistletoe can be worried by unfamiliar men and needs to be safely introduced follo
fields.about: Potential adopters will need a chat with our behaviour team as Mistletoe will go home on a lead and muzzle disclaimer due to her chase drive and reactions around men.

fields.name: Rex
fields.home_details: Rex has been under-socialised with other dogs but has been doing well with parallel walking, so is looking for owners that can continue to build up his confidence and walk him in very low dog populated areas while his skills are improving.
fields.about: To apply to rehome me, please click on the 'Come and Meet Me' button below. Applications will close when I have found a suitable match.

fields.name: Angus
fields.home_details: Angus is looking for a home where he can have his own private secure garden to relax and play and adopters that are active so can they can keep up with him. He can be a strong boy so will need adopters that are comfortable with this and that have experience of bullbreeds.
fields.about: Handsome Angus is a 14 month old Staffy cross looking for his new home! He is a super sweet big baby who loves a fuss and a hug! He loves his food so this will be great for onoging training and he loves his toys too, especially if they're soft and fluffy! Angus loves to climb in the car so we're sure he would make a great adventure buddy!

fields.name: Apache
fields.home_details: Apache would like his own good sized private garden with 6ft solid fencing where he can relax and play to his heart's content! A home with breed experience is preferable for this characterful boy but if not then researching the breed and having knowledge is essential before applying.
fields.about: Like a typical husky, Apache loves being outdoors exploring and sniffing and he would love an equally active home that can take him on adventures of hiking in the hills! It can take time for Apache to build a bond with you but patience and tasty treats are definitely a winning combination to this brilliant boy's heart. Once he knows you Apache enjoys a good stroke and a gentle fuss...on his terms of course!

fields.name: Beatrice
fields.home_details: Due to her shy nature, she think Beatrice would benefit from a quiet home and any children should be over 16 years old as she is an older lady looking for some quiet time. As she seems to find small spaces more comforting, her new home must be non open plan so she can find her safe space.
fields.about: Beatrice is a sweet but shy 10 year old greyhound who loves going on adventures and exploring the world. She likes meeting calm dogs similar to her breed but she can be nervous of dogs who are a little over the top with her. She enjoys her food so this would be beneficial to building her confidence and a bond with you. After a long walk, she likes to have a gentle fuss from you and settle on a nice comfy bed.

fields.name: Bram
fields.home_details: Bram has had quite an unsettled start to life and so will need very patient adopters that are willing to work with him, due to this he will need an adult only home with no visiting children. Bram will require his own private, large secure garden with constant outside access.
fields.about: Brilliant Bram is a 2 year-old Malinois cross with absolutely bags of potential! This super boy is so clever and loves to learn new things to add to his repertoire! Bram is also the best adventure buddy you can ever hope for and loves nothing more than to get in the car (where he settles brilliantly) and go on a nice long hike for a few hours in the hills or having a nice swim in a river.

fields.name: Brynn
fields.home_details: Brynn would suit a quiet home where he can have his own private secure garden. He is worried of lorries so will need his home to be setback from busy roads. Brynn can live with children aged 11 years and over who understand he may want his own space at times. Brynn can happily walk with other dogs.
fields.about: Brynn is a sweet 7 year old Lurcher who enjoys going on adventures and often likes to lead the way with his nose. He loves food especially yummy chews that he can relax on his bed chewing on! He also likes to play with toys and often chases anything that is thrown for him! Brynn can be shy initially but he does like a gentle fuss and will often lean into you when he wants scratches and attention!

fields.name: Ella
fields.home_details: Ella would like a calm, adult only home that has an understanding of Rottweilers. Ella would ideally like to be walked in quiet areas and in a low dog populated area as she is not comfortable with dogs getting too close - because of this she will be going home on a lead disclaimer which means she wi
fields.about: Ella is a beautiful 5 year old Rottweiler looking for a quiet home to call her own. She can be a shy girl at first but quickly builds a bond with you and her handlers can vouch for her playful and cheeky character! Although not keen on overhandling Ella does enjoy a gentle fuss and greets her handlers with a happy tail and leans in for a bum scratch.

fields.name: Elphie
fields.home_details: Elphie is worried around children therefore can live with older children aged 16 and over. She can be worried around other dogs so will need to be the dog in the home. As Elphie has come from a home with someone at home all of the time she can struggle to be left so will need a multi carer household
fields.about: Elphie is a sensitive soul who is looking for owners who have a quiet lifestyle and can offer her a quiet, peaceful home. Despite being 14 years old, Elphie still gets excited to go out on walks and really enjoys exploring her local surroundings. Elphie is good in the car so could go out on adventures and explore further afield. She really enjoys sitting on the sofa with you and can often be found snoozing away the afternoons on there.

fields.name: Freya
fields.home_details: Freya will need an adult only home with no visiting children as she can be worried of them. She will need a secure garden that she can potter around and explore as she loves spending time in our secure compounds here at the centre. Breed experience would be preferred.
fields.about: Freya is a lovely 7 year old Husky , she is a sweet and energetic girl who will make for great company in her new home. Freya loves spending time with her favourite people and gets super excited when she knows she's coming out for a play and a walk! She is an active girl and will best suit a home wanting a dog to accompany them on fun adventures, she travels really well in the car so could travel for walks, she is a great dog to walk and walks alongside with you nicely.

fields.name: Gravy
fields.home_details: Gravy has been very uncomfortable with dogs, although he can walk at a distance with dogs he is very tense up close and will growl if they get too close, he has managed to walk with other female Sighthounds but can be very intense. Gravy will need a home that has access to quiet walks.
fields.about: Gravy is a lovely, handsome 3 year old Lurcher who gets very excited to see his favourite people! He is a sweet boy with people and loves leaning into you for a fuss and cuddle! He loves his walks and always enjoys having his head to the ground sniffing, after a walk he loves coming back to his comfy bed where he can enjoy a tasty long lasting chew and have a snooze! He Is very motivated by food and his eyes light up when he sees treats are on offer!

fields.name: Gusty
fields.home_details: Gusty is looking for a non open plan home that has a secure private garden. He does have the potential to car chase so needs a home that isn't on a main road and where his walks can also be away from traffic. He can live with children aged 16 years and over who are comfortable around bouncy dogs.
fields.about: Gusty is a super handsome 1 year old crossbreed looking for his new home. Gusty loves saying hello to everyone and having a good cuddle and a fuss! He loves to head out on his walks for a sniff and explore. Gusty likes to spend his time getting tasty treats from his favourite people or playing with his toys, especially stuffy ones!

fields.name: Lady
fields.home_details: Lady would like her own private secure garden with 6ft fencing so she can play to her heart's content! As she can be a little shy she would like quiet areas she can be walked where minimal people would approach her and a home that can keep visitors to a minimum would also suit her best.
fields.about: Lady is a very sweet, sensitive 1 year old Saluki looking for her forever home. She is great fun and is most happy when she can run around, get a few tasty treats and have a fuss and a cuddle from her best friends! Lady has been a little shy initially but quickly comes round however she can be a little more worried around men. Lady is quite active and loves to be on the go, although she only has 3 legs she doesn't let this affect her and can very scooty and loves a game of chase!

fields.name: Peanut
fields.home_details: Peanut is looking for a home with adults only that would also like an active dog to keep up with them as she is a strong girl she will need adopters that are comfortable with a big/bouncy strong dog!
fields.about: Peanut is a fantastic 4-year-old crossbreed looking for a very active home to keep up with her energy levels. Peanut is a super lively girl who loves getting loads of fuss and attention from the people she knows. She is a very playful girl but can get over excited playing certain games! This can unfortunately result in her mouthing a lot, this has been seen both in kennels and a home environment, so adopters will need to feel comfortable dealing with this.

fields.name: Penny
fields.home_details: It's important that Penny's adopters are patient and sensitive to her past. She will need all future training to be done in a positive manner with no force used. She can bark at strangers so would need access to quiet walks and would love zoomies in a secure field.
fields.about: Penny is a 3 year old saluki cross. She is stunning, with beautiful black eyeliner and lashes to die for, she would without doubt be a supermodel if she were human. Penny is adored by her handlers for her fun character, constantly making them laugh with her antics. She loves to travel in the car and going on adventures in new places, especially if there is the opportunity to have a paddle in a nearby lake.

fields.name: Pepsi
fields.home_details: Due to her nervous nature, Pepsi is looking for an adult only home that can keep visitors to a mimimum. Pepsi can find a lot of things overwhelming so it's going to take some time before she's ready for walks so adopters will need to be prepared for this.
fields.about: Lovely little Pepsi is a sweet and gentle 8 year old Jack Russell looking for a calm and patient home to help her find her paws and grow in confidence. Pepsi can take some time to get to know you and is not a big fan of overhandling, but once she trusts you she likes to put her little paws on your knee for a gentle fuss! Pepsi loves her food but especially loves her toys, especially tennis balls that she loves to chase over and over again!

fields.name: Pudge
fields.home_details: Pudge does have a sensitive side and can get easily overwhelmed which he can show by being vocal. He can live with children aged 14 and over and his new family must be committed to his on-going training.
fields.about: Meet Pudge, a 6 year old pug x jack russell. Pudge can be a worried boy at times but is very affectionate to people that he knows and enjoys going on walks in quieter areas, where he can put his nose to the ground and follow all the different exciting smells. This cheeky chap will do anything for food and would love a family that can provide him with plenty of enrichment as he loves to keep busy.

fields.name: Rex
fields.home_details: Rex will need to go to an adult only home with people who preferably have collie experience, but if no experience, knowledge of the breed is essential. Adopters must be willing to work on his training, which will be demonstrated here at the centre.
fields.about: Lovely Rex, is a fantastic 1-year-old Border Collie with loads of potential in the right home that is committed to his ongoing training. Typical of the breed, Rex is super clever and loves to learn new things and is very food motivated - due to his young age and high energy, an active home that would enjoy a bit of a project to train and take on adventures would be ideal.

fields.name: Storm
fields.home_details: Storm is looking for his own private, secure garden with at least 6ft fencing as he has previously tried to jump a fence. Storm could live with children 14 and over as he's a cuddly boy! As Storm has shown that he is unhappy with dogs running up to him he will need to be kept onlead and muzzled.
fields.about: Storm is a loving 5 years old Akita looking for his forever home. Storm is a real people's dog - he just loves a fuss and a cuddle and to be around you. When our staff head to get him out on a morning, he's bursting with happiness to get going with his day, jumping up to say hello and giving you a big kiss!

fields.name: Tux
fields.home_details: Tux will need a private secure garden with minimum 6ft fencing so that he can enjoy playtime as he may not want to go for walks initially whilst settling. Adopters should have experience of retired greyhounds and be patient and understanding with Tux, being around for most of the time initially.
fields.about: Tux is a super sweet 17 month old Greyhound with bags of character and a constant waggy tail. He loves to be in the company of people, enjoying a fuss and likes to say hello to other friendly dogs out and about. He likes going on adventures and is a playful lad with his toys but in true Greyhound style after a zoom around our compounds here he loves nothing more than a full tummy and the comfort of a snuggly duvet.

fields.name: Lexi
fields.home_details: Lexi is needing her own private secure garden to have a safe space to play offlead. She isn't used to being left for long hours and is quite clingy so will need adopters with minimal leaving hours initially and a non open plan home to help her settle.
fields.about: Lexi is a sweet 8 year old Jack Russell looking for a very special home. She has come from quite a sheltered background and is not very socialised around other dogs or people so will need patient and understanding adopters that can give her time to settle her paws. Once Lexi knows you well she enjoys sitting on your knee having a fuss or just chilling on a comfy bed with a chew! She also likes to head out on quiet walks where she can have a sniff and explore.

fields.name: Nellie
fields.home_details: Nellie will need a super active home as she will keep you on your toes! Nellie is very friendly with dogs and loves meeting them out and about but she can be very over the top and does struggle to share resources so will need to be the only dog in the home.
fields.about: Nellie is a sweet little 11 month old Terrier who loves to be on the go! She is a super live wire who is always bounding around and springing in the air! Nellie is deaf so will need adopters that can do some research into this and use doggy hand signals. Nellie is very foodie and loves her treats so this will be great motivation for her training!
